headline: Does Netflix’s Warner Bros. Bid and Buyback Pause Change The Bull Case For Netflix (NFLX)?
summary: Earlier this week, Netflix reported fourth-quarter and full-year 2025 results, with revenue rising to US$12,050.76 million for the quarter and US$45.18 billion for the year alongside higher net income and earnings per share. At the same time, Netflix paused its long-running share repurchase program and pressed ahead with an all-cash bid for Warner Bros. Discovery’s studios and streaming assets, raising questions about future growth, margins, and execution risk. With these developments and...

headline: Netflix's Greg Peters Says Paramount's Warner Bros Bid Has No Chance Without Larry Ellison, Calls Debt Plan 'Pretty Crazy'
summary: Netflix Inc. (NASDAQ:NFLX) co-CEO Greg Peters said Paramount Skydance's (NASDAQ:PSKY) $108 billion hostile bid for Warner Bros. Discovery (NASDAQ:WBD) is unrealistic without Oracle Corp (NYSE:ORCL) founder Larry Ellison's financial backing. Discovery, saying the offer "doesn't pass the sniff test" and would collapse without Ellison's personal support. I

headline: U.S. Millionaires Considering Migration: The Numbers
summary: A new survey of 1,0000 millionaires suggests that a third are motivated to leave the U.S. a year into President Donald Trump’s second term.
